extendedInfo.description: The easiest way to keep score at a cricket match with the most detail captured. Determines and displays detailed stats of cricket matches as automatically as possible, with minimal data entry. If you are not an official scorer for a team, you may enjoy keeping score as you watch limited overs, Twenty20, IPL, or a Test match live or on television, perhaps while watching your child play. Many users of this app manage to umpire and keep score at the same time.* Just touch where the ball reached, then pick how many runs were scored * Produces wagon wheels for each batsman and an e-mailable scorecard (including a wagon wheel page per batsman) for publishing to a web site or transfer to a computer* Press Menu button for scorecard and then More ... for other features such as saving/loading a game* Long tap batsman, bowler and 'This Over' areas of Runs tab for less commonly used actions such as retired hurt or declare inningsEnjoy this free app, like I have enjoyed so many of the other free Android apps! - Tim. "Give and it will be given to you."***************************Please e-mail me feedback (address below in Developer Info section) since I can't reply to comments left with ratings or contact you regarding bug fixes/change requests.See WEB PAGE (also below in Developer Info section) for app TIPS and limitations.IMPORTANT: Don't use this Android app as your only record of scoring for a match, no liability accepted for incorrect data or data loss.If you would like some more advanced scoring features then please check out the paid version of this app: "Android Cricket Scorer+". Android Cricket Scorer+ is Android Cricket Scorer PLUS new features/changes, many requested by users.

reviews.title: Excellent scorer
reviews.comment: I have been using this for the last couple of weeks for our league matches and while it took some time to get the hang of it, I believe it is fairly simple to use and most comprehensive scorer. The only thing I couldn\'t find is an option of consolidated wagon wheel for the entire team. It does provide individual batsmen wagon wheels though when we email the scorecard.
reviews.author: Vishal Janani

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I am a coach at school level and love this app. Takes a bit getting used to but play around and you will get it. Realle great thanks

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I am really enjoying this app as I am currently using it to score an U-13 tournament in Barbados with much success!  What would be really useful is if I could put the players stats into another programme to get the end of season stats e.g most runs, most catches, averages, wickets etc. Do you think this would be possible?
